content:
# The smelting process has produced 1 Iron Plate, and there are still 7 units of Iron Ore remaining in the Stone Furnace.
# This means the furnace is still operational and can continue to smelt more Iron Ore.

# I will wait a bit longer to allow the furnace to complete the smelting of the remaining Iron Ore.
# After waiting, I will check the output inventory again to see how many Iron Plates have been produced.

sleep(5)  # Wait for another 5 seconds for the smelting process to continue.
output_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)  # Check the output inventory of the furnace again.
print(f"Furnace output after waiting: {output_inventory}")  # Display the updated output inventory of the furnace.
